module.title: Shop: Specials
module.log: Adjust to changes in Hydrogen Framework version 0.8.7.3.
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>shop_specials` ( `shopSpecialId` int(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `creatorId` int(11) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', `bridgeId` int(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `articleId` int(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `styleRules` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `styleFiles` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`shopSpecialId`), KEY `creatorId` (`creatorId`), KEY `bridgeId` (`bridgeId`), KEY `articleId` (`articleId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
